Title: Day 6: 3:00 A.M. - 4:00 A.M.
Plot: Jack runs a desperate tactic to free the CTU hostages from their captors. He manages to intercept Cheng, who plans to deliver Josh to his grandfather in exchange for the circuit board. Jack is forced to allow Cheng to escape in order to save Josh's life.Lennox continues to monitor Lisa as she plants evidence for Mark to deliver to the Russians. The situation takes a nasty turn when all does not go according to plan. Meanwhile, Daniels tries to run a bluff on the Russian president, but finds he's
GuestStars: Ian Anthony Dale, Spencer Garrett, Matt McKenzie, Ron Yuan, James Cromwell, Kari Matchett, Michael Shanks, Powers Boothe
